description: Detects execution of the Impersonate tool. Which can be used to manipulate tokens on a Windows computers remotely (PsExec/WmiExec) or interactively
author: Sai Prashanth Pulisetti @pulisettis
name: HackTool - Impersonate Execution
query: (((process.command_line.text:*impersonate.exe* AND process.command_line.text:(*\ list\ * OR *\ exec\ * OR *\ adduser\ *))) OR (((winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=9520714AB576B0ED01D1513691377D01* OR *SHA256\=E81CC96E2118DC4FBFE5BAD1604E0AC7681960143E2101E1A024D52264BB0A8A* OR *IMPHASH\=0A358FFC1697B7A07D0E817AC740DF62*)) OR (md5:"9520714AB576B0ED01D1513691377D01") OR (sha256:"E81CC96E2118DC4FBFE5BAD1604E0AC7681960143E2101E1A024D52264BB0A8A") OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:"0A358FFC1697B7A07D0E817AC740DF62"))))
